title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Phoebe say being pregnant is no piece of?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'being pregnant is no piece of cake' when discussing her cravings.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What smell is coming from the bathroom that Phoebe wants to eat?
questions.explanation: Phoebe smells Joey's bologna sandwich in the bathroom and wants to eat it.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: Why is Rachel writing a note to put in Joshua's coat pocket?
options: To give him her phone number
To ask him out on a date
questions.correct_answer: To ask him out on a date
questions.explanation: Rachel writes a note to ask Joshua out, but decides to put it in his coat pocket instead.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Ross sign up for to impress Emily?
questions.explanation: Ross signs up for helicopter classes to impress Emily.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: Why does Rachel want to have a party?
options: To show off her cooking skills
questions.explanation: Rachel wants to have a party to get Joshua's attention and seduce him.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What game do the friends play at the party?
questions.explanation: The friends play Spin the Bottle at the party.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Phoebe crave while pregnant?
questions.explanation: Phoebe craves meat while pregnant, despite being a vegetarian.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Joey offer to do for Phoebe?
questions.explanation: Joey offers to give up meat until the baby is born to balance out Phoebe's meat consumption.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Rachel wear to impress Joshua?
questions.explanation: Rachel wears her high school cheerleading uniform to impress Joshua.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: Why does Joshua return to the party?
options: To thank Rachel for the party
questions.explanation: Joshua returns to the party to ask Rachel out, despite initially saying he's not ready for a relationship.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Ross realize about his feelings for Emily?
options: He doesn't have feelings for her
He only likes her as a friend
He wants to spend more time with her
He wants to end their relationship
questions.correct_answer: He wants to spend more time with her
questions.explanation: Ross realizes he doesn't want his relationship with Emily to end and wants to spend more time with her.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Phoebe make for herself after the party?
questions.explanation: Phoebe makes a sandwich for herself after the party, with pastrami and other meats.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Joey say goes well with pastrami?
questions.explanation: Joey suggests that corned beef goes well with pastrami on a sandwich.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: How long does Phoebe have until the baby is due?
questions.explanation: Phoebe has 6 months until the baby is due.

questions.question: What does Rachel try to do to get Joshua's attention?
options: She tries to dance with him
She tries to play a game with him
She tries to take off her bra
questions.correct_answer: She tries to take off her bra
questions.explanation: Rachel tries to take off her bra to get Joshua's attention, but it gets stuck in her sleeve.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Gunther claim to be?
questions.explanation: Gunther claims to be Rachel's boyfriend, but it's unclear if he's being serious or not.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: Why does Ross hurry back inside the apartment?
options: To tell Emily how he really feels
questions.correct_answer: To tell Emily how he really feels
questions.explanation: Ross hurries back inside the apartment to tell Emily how he really feels and to try to spend more time with her.

topic.title: The One With The Fake Party

questions.question: What does Joey suggest Rachel do to get Joshua's attention?
questions.explanation: Joey suggests that Rachel take off her bra to get Joshua's attention, referencing a scene from the movie Flashdance.

questions.question: What does Rachel wear to try to seduce Joshua?
questions.explanation: Rachel wears her high school cheerleading uniform to try to seduce Joshua and get his attention.

questions.question: What does Joshua say he's not ready for?
questions.explanation: Joshua says he's not ready for a relationship, despite being attracted to Rachel.

questions.question: What does Ross learn about Emily's feelings for him?
options: She only likes him as a friend
She wants to spend more time with him
